code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Books=()=>{const[books,setBooks]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const backendUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL;const fetchBooks=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(backendUrl,"/api/books/top-books"));setBooks(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching data:',error);}};fetchBooks();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Top Books"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ol",{type:"1",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:book.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Authors: ",book.authors.join(', ')]}),book.thumbnail&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:book.thumbnail,alt:"Book Thumbnail"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:book.previewLink,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"Preview Link"})})]},book.id))})]});};export default Books;
